stimulusHtml: Research on intelligence tests must be especially mindful of ethical principles related to confidentiality of data. A major reason for this is best described by which of the following?
choicesHtml: Intelligence test scores have been used to determine access to opportunities such as jobs and education.
Intelligence test scores are correlated with other personal characteristics such as personality.
Institutions are required to report data on intelligence test scores.
Research on intelligence often involves deception.
